event.title: is best known for its parish church (until 1975

data.event: There are a number of interesting architectural monuments in the centre of the village, but Suha is best known for its parish church (until 1975 belonging to the Parish of Škofja Loka) dedicated to John the Baptist.
Notable people that were born or lived in Suha include: Andrej Glavan (1943–), the Bishop of Novo Mesto, the first parish priest of the Parish of Suha
